Package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.json

Class JsonPathExtractor

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.db.json.JsonPathExtractor
public class JsonPathExtractor extends Object
Utility class for extracting values from JSON using JsonPath.

This class facilitates extracting specific values from JSON structures by applying JsonPath expressions and converting the results to the desired type.

    • JsonPathExtractor

      public JsonPathExtractor(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, com.jayway.jsonpath.Configuration jsonPathConfig)
      Constructs a JsonPathExtractor with a custom JsonPath configuration.
      Parameters:
      objectMapper - The ObjectMapper for JSON processing.
      jsonPathConfig - The Configuration for JsonPath evaluation.

    • JsonPathExtractor

      public JsonPathExtractor(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
      Constructs a JsonPathExtractor with a default JsonPath configuration.

      The default configuration enables SUPPRESS_EXCEPTIONS option.

      Parameters:
      objectMapper - The ObjectMapper for JSON processing.

  • Method Details

    • extract

      public <T> T extract(Object data, String jsonPath, Class<T> resultType)
      Extracts a value from the given data using the specified JsonPath expression.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The expected type of the extracted value.
      Parameters:
      data - The data object containing JSON structure.
      jsonPath - The JsonPath expression to apply.
      resultType - The target type of the extracted value.
      Returns:
      The extracted value converted to the specified type, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      JsonPathExtractionException - If JSON conversion or extraction fails.
